attributes.action: Make government take action on the issue of the lack of care left foster system
attributes.additional_details: As they are the main decision makers of the UK and we feel that targeting the government in asking for our help would be most effective.
attributes.background: Our aim is to draw your attention to this crisis which is currently impacting the youth of the UK. We believe that you need to take more action and responsibility of the failure of over 50% of children that have left the foster system said by a survey done by "The fostering network"

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Review and increase the amount of support care leavers get post-18
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710233
